trans-unit.source: Specifies which HTTP verb is used to invoke a method, and the format of the response.
trans-unit.target: 指定哪些 HTTP 動詞命令用來叫用方法與回應的格式。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to specify information for methods that can be called from client script.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來指定可以從用戶端指令碼呼叫的方法資訊。

trans-unit.source: The attribute lets you specify which HTTP verb (GET or POST) can be used to invoke a method.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可讓您指定哪些 HTTP 動詞命令 （GET 或 POST） 可以用來叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: It also lets you specify whether the response is formatted by using either JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) or XML.
trans-unit.target: 它也可讓您指定是否使用 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) 或 XML 格式化回應。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptMethodAttribute attribute is optional.
trans-unit.target: ScriptMethodAttribute 屬性是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: (However, methods that can be called from client script must have the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute applied.).
trans-unit.target: (不過，可以從用戶端指令碼呼叫的方法必須有<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>套用的屬性。)。</xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a method is not marked with ScriptMethodAttribute, the method will be called by using the HTTP POST command and the response will be serialized as JSON.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法未標示 ScriptMethodAttribute 與中，使用 HTTP POST 命令也會呼叫的方法和回應會序列化為 JSON。

trans-unit.source: You cannot override this setting from script.
trans-unit.target: 您無法覆寫這項設定指令碼。

trans-unit.source: ScriptMethodAttribute takes only named parameters.
trans-unit.target: ScriptMethodAttribute 會採用只有具名參數。

trans-unit.source: The following are the properties of the ScriptMethodAttribute class that can be used as named parameters: - <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.UseHttpGet%2A> Specifies whether the method will be invoked by using the HTTP GET command.
trans-unit.target: 以下是可用來當做具名參數 ScriptMethodAttribute 類別的屬性:-<xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.UseHttpGet%2A>指定使用 HTTP GET 命令是否會叫用此方法。</xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.UseHttpGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Setting the <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.UseHttpGet%2A> property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定<xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.UseHttpGet%2A>屬性`true`可能會造成安全性風險，您的應用程式，如果您正在使用機密資料或交易。</xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.UseHttpGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering.
trans-unit.target: 在 GET 要求訊息由瀏覽器編碼成 URL，因此遭到竄改的輕鬆目標。

trans-unit.source: For both GET and POST requests, you should follow security guidelines to protect sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: GET 和 POST 要求，您應該遵循安全性指導方針來保護機密資料。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A> Specifies whether the response will be serialized as JSON or as XML.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A>指定是否將回應序列化為 JSON 或 XML。</xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default is `Json`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`Json`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A> property is useful to specify XML as the return type when the method returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A>屬性可用於 XML 指定為傳回型別，方法傳回時<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>物件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.XmlSerializeString%2A> Specifies whether all return types, including string types, are serialized as XML.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.XmlSerializeString%2A>指定是否要將所有的傳回型別，包括字串型別序列化為 XML。</xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.XmlSerializeString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.XmlSerializeString%2A> property is ignored when the response is serialized as JSON.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.XmlSerializeString%2A>回應序列化為 JSON 時，則會忽略屬性。</xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.XmlSerializeString%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format of the method response.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定方法回應的格式。

trans-unit.source: Use the ResponseFormat property when you want to specify XML as the format for the return type.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要指定 XML 做為傳回類型的格式，請使用 ResponseFormat 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the method returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
trans-unit.target: 方法傳回時這非常有用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>物件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: When the ResponseFormat property is set to `Xml`, the public fields and properties of the return type that have the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute> attribute applied will not be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 當 ResponseFormat 屬性設定為`Xml`，公用欄位和屬性的傳回型別具有<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute>套用屬性不會忽略。</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This is because they will be serialized by using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> object instead of the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> object.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為它們會序列化使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>物件而非<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>物件。</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: You must apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute> attribute to make <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> ignore, or skip, those public fields and properties of the return type.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先套用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>屬性，而讓<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>略過，或略過，這些公用的欄位和屬性的傳回型別。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Script.Services.ResponseFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Script.Services.ResponseFormat"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Json" name="Json" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Json" name="Json" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to invoke the method by using HTTP GET.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要使用 HTTP GET 來叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot override this property from ECMAScript (JavaScript) on the client.
trans-unit.target: 您無法覆寫來自 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 用戶端上的這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, invoking the method from script will always use HTTP GET.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，叫用指令碼的方法一律會使用 HTTP GET。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the client proxy code uses HTTP GET to call the Web service.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，用戶端 proxy 程式碼會使用 HTTP GET 呼叫 Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Each input parameter for the method appears as a query parameter in the URL that is used to invoke the Web method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的每個輸入的參數會顯示為用來叫用 Web 方法的 URL 中的查詢參數。

trans-unit.source: The parameter value is obtained through JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) serialization and URL encoding of the parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 取得參數值透過 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 序列化和 URL 編碼的參數值。

trans-unit.source: The use of HTTP GET for invoking the Web service method follows the same guidelines for any other Web interaction.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HTTP GET，叫用 Web 服務方法會遵循相同的任何其他 Web 互動的指導方針。

trans-unit.source: HTTP GET should be used only for operations where no sensitive data is exposed and when the server action does not have side effects.
trans-unit.target: HTTP GET 應該只針對作業公開任何機密資料的位置以及使用伺服器的動作不能有副作用。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Setting the UseHttpGet property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > UseHttpGet 屬性設定為`true`可能會造成安全性風險，您的應用程式，如果您正在使用機密資料或交易。

trans-unit.source: In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering.
trans-unit.target: 在 GET 要求訊息由瀏覽器編碼成 URL，因此遭到竄改的輕鬆目標。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is invoked by using the HTTP GET command; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the method is invoked by using the HTTP POST command.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用 HTTP GET 命令; 叫用此方法<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果使用 HTTP POST 命令叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all return types are serialized as XML, which includes string types.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否將所有傳回型別會序列化為 XML，其中包括字串型別。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, all return types are serialized as XML, except string, which is interpreted as XML markup.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`false`，所有傳回型別會序列化為 XML，除了解譯為 XML 標記的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, and if the return type is a string, and if the string does not contain XML markup that corresponds to a well-formed XML document, the succeeded callback function will be invoked but the resulting serialized string will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`false`，因此如果的傳回型別是字串，而且如果字串不包含對應至格式正確的 XML 文件的 XML 標記，成功的回呼函式會叫用但所產生的序列化的字串`null`。

trans-unit.source: The value of XmlSerializeString is ignored when the <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A> property is set to `Json`.
trans-unit.target: 會忽略 XmlSerializeString 值時<xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A>屬性設定為`Json`。</xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all return types are serialized as XML; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果所有的傳回型別會序列化為 XML。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
